alert.note: Alert for Butler (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 11:38AM EDT until March 26 at 6:17AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers... Great Miami River near Middletown. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Great Miami River near Middletown. * WHEN...From this morning to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water approaches structures south of Route 73 between Excello and the Great Miami River. This includes properties along Oxford Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 12.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.9 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
